meaningMnemonic: The <radical>life</radical> of a <radical>shellfish</radical> is filled with <kanji>blame</kanji>. They take the blame for everything from food poisoning and allergies, to cutting people's feet on beaches.
readingMnemonic: When those poor shellfish aren't having <kanji>blame</kanji> piled on them, they're being eaten, because shellfish are thought to make for a very <reading>sexy</reading> (せき) meal.
